title: Pat Lencioni on Leading Through Serving
description:
Today, we’re hosting leadership and organizational health expert and legend Pat Lencioni. In one of the best conversations on the show to date, we cover topics like why money won’t make you happy, the purpose of pain, and how to lead through serving.
 Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp
 DreamCloud
 Churchill Mortgage

  Questions for Humans Conversation Cards

Today, we’re hosting leadership and organizational health expert and legend Pat Lencioni. In one of the best conversations on the show to date, we cover topics like why money won’t make you happy, the purpose of pain, and how to lead through serving.

Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
